long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Operate more efficiently in Veeqo across all of your views

______________________________________________________________________

FEATURES

✔️ New Order Notifications

Stop constantly refreshing to see any new orders: instantly get a notification in Veeqo when new orders have come in, including how many, and conveniently reload your Orders view with one click.


✔️ Shipped Orders Plus

See shipped order details upfront: easily access the date and time shipped, the shipping carrier and service, shipping label price, dimensions and weight of the shipment, plus the tracking number with one-click copy, directly in the Shipped Orders view.


✔️ Order Tags

No more hovering required: automatically see the name of your order tags without moving your mouse over them.


✔️ Product Price & Profit

Compare your products: see product price and profitability right on the Products List view.
 
______________________________________________________________________

Download the Veeqo Power Tools extension today and try it RISK FREE for seven days. Learn more at https://starren.app/veeqo-power-tools.
